basics.name: Paul Osorio Schuler
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: As a Full Stack Developer, I have successfully implemented multiple applications focusing on performance and security. I lead teams effectively, ensuring the best possible environment where people can do their best. I have mostly worked on financial solutions for banks in Peru, using .NET, C#, and SQL Server. Currently, I am working for Chekalo.pe with Typescript, React, Remix, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. I have over 10 years of experience in the software industry, working in various roles.

work.name: Chekalo.pe
work.summary: I have implemented Chekalo.pe web app, which is continuously being improved and updated with new features. Chekalo.pe is a price aggregator web app designed to help users find the best prices for products from various stores in Peru. Technologies: React/Remix, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js/NestJS, PostgreSQL.

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
work.summary: I have successfully overseen the development of the Robotic Process Automation (RPA) team and spearheaded the implementation of diverse automation processes across multiple areas within the bank. My role involved providing technical expertise to the development team to design, develop, and implement these solutions. Technologies used include C#, .NET, Pega Robotics, and MS SQL Server.

work.name: Banco de Crédito BCP
work.position: Smart Automation Tech Leader → Tribe Technical Leader
work.summary: I spearheaded the implementation of cutting-edge Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions for the bank by leading multiple teams. A significant achievement was establishing a framework and standards for Automation Anywhere implementations, ensuring consistency and quality across all teams. Technologies: C#, .NET, Automation Anywhere, MS SQL Server, REST API.

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
work.summary: I led the RPA (Robotic Process Automation) team, implementing Pega Robotics solutions across various operational areas of the bank. Leveraging my technical expertise in design, development, and deployment, I ensured high performance and stability solutions, while providing strong leadership to drive operational efficiency. Technologies: C#, .NET, Pega Robotics, MS SQL Server.

work.name: Scotiabank Perú
work.summary: I led the design and development of new applications and took charge of maintaining and optimizing existing solutions within the bank. Additionally, I provided strong leadership to small development teams, driving them towards successful project outcomes. Technologies: C#, .NET, VB .NET, MS SQL Server, AS400, COBOL

work.name: Software Enterprise Services
work.summary: As a developer, I have implemented new features for the loan web application at the bank, using my technical skills to improve functionality and user experience. Technologies: C#, .NET, VB .NET, MS SQL Server, AS400, COBOL

work.name: MINEDU Peru
work.summary: I led the implementation of an academic system to streamline admission processes and student data management at national educational institutions. As a Full Stack Developer, I utilized my technical expertise to carefully design and develop comprehensive solutions. Technologies: C#, MVC, .NET, SQL Server, PHP, Yii Framework, MySQL

work.name: Software Enterprise Services
work.summary: I worked as a developer, focusing on implementing new features for a banking system dedicated to mortgage loan management. My responsibilities included enhancing the system's functionality and usability through the integration of innovative features. Technologies: C#, .NET, VB .NET, MS SQL Server, AS400, COBOL

work.name: SISPRO S.A.C.
work.summary: As a software developer, I played a key role in implementing a new banking application. I specifically worked on developing a customer identification system that smoothly integrated with a queue management system with RENIEC (National Registry of Identification and Civil Status). Technologies: C#, .NET, MS SQL Server, WebSphere MQ

education.area: Completed several courses in Front-end & Back-end development. Ex. Modern JS, TypeScript, React, Remix, Node.js.

certificates.name: Junior to Senior Web Developer Roadmap
